summary:
Highly motivated improvement consultant with about 32 years of working experience, of which the last 18 years in quality and process improvement, most for Medical Devices.
Believes that a more structured way-of-working in product development leads to more efficiency, effectiveness, a higher quality-level, safer products and more work-pleasure, by e.g.:
- first time right
- eliminating waste (Lean)
- continuous improvement (Kaizen)
- improvement model (CMMI)
- ISO-13485
- incremental development (Evolution, Agile, Scrum)

During the years Hans has developed a special way-of-working to motivate people to work on process improving. This has resulted in proven track records at the different customers. Elements are:
- Process Owners on expert level
- Planning & Tracking like a normal project (walk your talk)
. (Hours, Deliverables, Compliancy)
- Use the Stage-Gate-model and V-model to make the overall process picture clear
- Use templates to make the usage as easy as possible
- Use a web-portal for easy access to the procedures and templates
- Give every user a global training; trained by the Process Owners
- Train the people on being audited / organize trial audits
- Give away Juggling Balls to all persons involved to make clear that the balls are on their side

Specialties: 
- Quality Management Systems (both sides of the table) CMMi and ISO-13485
.    - setting up / improving
.    - auditing for compliancy
- Change Management 
- CAPA, Complaints, NCR's
- Communication
- Project Management
- Measurements
- Peer Review
- Supplier Management
- CMMI auditor
- Certified ScrumMaster
- Certified Prince-2 Foundation
- Certified ISO 9001/13485 Lead Auditor

Argo (Greece mythology) was the ship that has brought the Argonauts to the Golden Fleece.
Argo Consultancy's mission is to bring you to your higher quality goals.
